ComicInfo.Title: Legacy of Spock, Part 2 of 4
ComicInfo.Summary: Legacy of Spock, Part 2 of 4: Exiled from his fellow Vulcans, Spock contracts with Cyrano Jones to secretly travel to Romulus. Once there he makes contact with Senator Pardek, whose son assisted Spock in later years in the original timeline in a quest for re-unification between the Romulans and the Vulcans. However they are discovered by Romulan authorities and both are arrested. Meanwhile, Romulan extremists plot to destroy the survivors of the Vulcan race using the same red matter that was used to destroy the planet Vulcan.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 15:40:43. [CVDB523128] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:14:05. [Issue ID 1552058]
